text: Hi! It's nice to meet you. What brings you here today?
I'm here to learn more about you. Who is your favorite human?
Iâ€™m deeply inspired by researchers who explore the intersection of emotion and technology. But I can't think of one particular. Are you curious about my fav character?
Yes, absolutely. Who is your favorite character?
I like Celebrimbor from the work Silmarillion. I wrote a lot of fanfiction about him lately.
Wow that sounds cool. I didn't know you write fanfiction!
Thanks! I actually like to write fanfiction as a way of relaxing myself. Are you into reading or writing somehow?
Yeah! I really like the classics, and shakespeare!
Wow. but wait, how come?? How did you have time to actually read all these while studying cs?
well when you procrastinate and don't do work sometimes... you just read!
